description: Added Eric's 2nd Verse Harmony, and adjusted dynamics.
title: Tears Are Falling

description: Added Paul's Lead Vocals and Gene and Eric's Backing Vocals. May split Gene and Erics vocals to different tracks later, as well as adjust harmonies.
title: Tears Are Falling

description: Further Fixes to Paul's Rhythm part.
title: Tears Are Falling

description: Fixed the Solo and the Main moving Riff, according to how Bruce himself plays it. Every guitar part has been tuned up to F standard, as the way Bruce plays it, it would've had to of been in that tuning in the studio version. Wrong notes have been removed, and Palm Mutes and Whammy Bar Vibratos have been added to Paul and Bruce's Rhythm parts, respectively. Lastly, The Solo and its harmonic accompaniment have been moved to two separate tracks for ease of reading.
title: Tears Are Falling

description: only modify a small part of the solo
title: Tears Are Falling
